title._content: Image taken from page 86 of 'Kulu: its beauties, antiquities and silver mines, including a trip over the Snowy Range and glaciers. By the author of “Notes on the Mineral Wealth of India” [i.e. J. Calvert]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Kulu: its beauties, antiquities and silver mines, including a trip over the Snowy Range and glaciers.
